name: Touch the Dead
description:
Rob Steiner has been jailed for a murder he has not committed. Suddenly
he finds himself surrounded by bloodthirsty Zombies! From high security
prisons to research facilities, pick up your gun and blast your way out!
Play alone or with the DS wireless communication.

Features

• Stand alone or with a friend in infections, innovative multiplayer and
Co-Op story mode
• Bring death to the Undead masses using the stylus
and touch screen
• Four terrifying chapters of horror, suspense and
action lurking around every corner
